NOM - Lil Smokies

It's a Christmas Eve treat

I love a bowl of these sticky, sweet, and slightly spicy sausages. Time to play Xbox while nibbling.

Lil' Smokies

Ingredients

  • (12 ounce) bottle chili sauce
  • 1 cup grape jelly
  • 1-3lb Little Smokies sausage (cocktail sausages)

Takes 30 minutes, serves four people.

Directions

  1. Mix all ingredients
  2. Cook in crockpot for one hour or on stove top for 30 minutes

I cook slowly for a longer time until sauce thickens and is clinging to the sausages.

Meta
